price: ¡Oh, creyentes! Tengan paciencia, perseverancia, defiéndanse y tengan temor de Dios, que así tendrán éxito.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱصۡبِرُواْ وَصَابِرُواْ وَرَابِطُواْ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū iṣ'birū waṣābirū warābiṭū wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
